alert.note: Alert for Grant; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 30 at 6:28PM CDT until April 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GRANT AND SOUTHEASTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Tull, or 10 miles southeast of Benton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Orion... Cane Creek... East End... Belfast... Ico... Sardis... Shaw... Woodson... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 11 and 13. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
